articles.title: New coronavirus can persist in aerosol form for hours, on surfaces for days, new study says - CBC.ca
articles.description: The highly-contagious novel coronavirus can remain viable and infectious in droplets in the air for hours and on surfaces up to days, according to a new study that should offer guidance to help people avoid contracting the respiratory illness called COVID-19.
